name: Industrial and Fine Art Exhibition Copenhagen
engraver: George Ludwig Friedrich Schmahlfeld and Henrik Olrik
obverse: Female figure flanked by two males.
obverse_inscriptions: FOR HVERT ET TAB IGJEN ERSTATNING FINDES HVAD UDAD TABES, DET MAA INDAD VINDES
reverse: Copenhagen Exhibition Building. Above, a three leaf clover with a triangle in the middle.
description: The exhibition was held in Copenhagen in 1872.
